item.description:
Enjoy hits by this Canadian rock band, including "American Woman," "These Eyes," "No Time," "No Sugar Tonight," "Share the Land" and "Clap for the Wolfman."
"ITS TIME TO ROCK AND ROLL"
item.why: It's the fourth and finale concert on the Green in Hamden. Can you belive it "The Guess Who' it such a popular band and they will be right here in Hamden "WOW" bring some finger food and a bottle of wine to share Be Early This Concert Will Be Packed

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "The Guess Who in Concert on the "Green in Hamden"
